/************************************************************************************************************************************************************
 * @file Ex_11_2.cpp
 * @brief Exercise 11.2: Give an example of when each of list, vector, deque, map, and set might be most useful.
 * @date 2024-01-09
 * 
 * @copyright Copyright (c) 2024
 * 
 *************************************************************************************************************************************************************/

list   : list of most visited sites
vector : list of odd numbers
deque  : flight ticket booking system, where a person can be added at the front or last based on fare and removed from front or last 
map    : dictionary  maps words to definitions 
set    : set of vowels

example of deque : https://stackoverflow.com/a/26681486
